title: Chart: US sets new record with $71B in clean energy investment
excerpt: In the first quarter of this year, private investors poured 40% more money into clean energy and electric vehicles than they did in Q1 2023.

title: Oil System Collapsing so Fast it May Derail Renewables, Warn French Governm
excerpt: Forget ‘peak oil’. Nafeez Ahmed reveals how the oil and gas industries are cannibalising themselves as the costs of fossil fuel extraction mount
